did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: John W. Macy Letter to Richard Strassberg Regarding Employee-Management in Federal Civil Service, 1983
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Letter from John W. Macy to Richard Strassberg regarding U.S. President's Committee to Review E.O. 10988 (Employee-Management Program in the Federal Civil Service), and related correspondence.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a letter from John W. Macy to Richard Strassberg regarding U.S. President's Committee to Review E.O. 10988 (Employee-Management Program in the Federal Civil Service), and related correspondence.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: United States. President's Committee to Review E.O. 10988

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: John W. Macy Letter to Richard Strassberg Regarding Employee-Management in Federal Civil Service #5726m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
